body.name: Noodle Board Stove Cover with Handles, Multiple Stove Top Cover Board for Electric/Gas Stove Top(Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 4 hrs 52 mins
features: MORE WORK SPACE: No more space in your already cramped kitchen? Don't worry, Add more usable space to your kitchen with our noodle board stove cover while also keeping it clean. This noodle board stove cover is perfect for small apartments, RVs and anywhere you need extra space and can greatly increase kitchen bench space.

MULTIPLE USES: aside from stovetop cover functionality it also can be used as serving tray or charcuterie board, Serve delicious food on dining tables, bring snacks on coffee table, relish lazy breakfast on Sunday morning or unwind after a hard day at work in the bathtub.

GREAT FARMHOUSE DECOR: Use this as stove top cover board or simply as farmhouse kitchen decoration to decorate your kitchen stove for more country ambience, and we provide a variety of wood materials for you to choose stove top cover board that is more suitable for your home decoration style

SUPERIOR QUALITY: You're worth it! our bamboo noodle board stove top cover for serving are safe, smooth, sturdy, eco-friendly, and durable enough to withstand the wear and tear of everyday use for years to come without losing their aesthetic appeal!
ELEGANT WOOD: The stovetop cover board is expertly crafted from bamboo of the highest quality. our stovetop cover is 29.5 inches wide x 22 inches deep and fit almost all stoves

Why choose GaShell? GaShell has been committed to digging deeper into every need of our customers' lives, combining simple, fashionable and practical product elements with everyday items to provide them with high-value, high-quality products. Can the GaShell Noodle Board Stove Cover be used on all types of stoves? The product is designed to fit most stoves, but it is always recommended to measure your stove before purchasing to ensure a perfect fit. What are the exact dimensions of the GaShell Noodle Board Stove Cover? The dimensions of the stove cover is 29.5 inches wide x 22 inches deep and fit almost all stoves Will the board scratch my glass cooktop surface? No. For glass cooktops we include optional silicone feet for the board.

More Color Options Black Stove Top Cover Gray Stove Top Cover White Stove Top Cover Material Bamboo Material Bamboo Material Bamboo Color Black Color Gray Color White Item Dimensions 29.5x22 Inches Item Dimensions 29.5x22 Inches Item Dimensions 29.5x22 Inches

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm thrilled with this purchase. I was looking at noodle boards for awhile, however I didn't want to spend too much. I also didn't want to sacrifice appearance and quality. I came across this one which balanced the need for a great price and quality. It arrived undamaged. There was a minor spot that I feel that could've had a little more stain but it's not enough to dock off stars or make a huge fuss over. The handles on the board I may replace in the future because they are a little thin and I was looking at a different style to match my preference, but the board itself is solid. I like the ability to place the little pad protectors underneath to help prevent sliding. I purchased the board to go on our new flat-top range. This serves the purpose of protecting the glass top and provides me a little extra space while making the kitchen look classier. Don't hesitate to purchase this board if you want something simple and functional.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Brand new appliances installed - yea! Whoops - I have an active family and a replacement top for a new range is spendy. I started looking for alternatives to cover the rangetop, while not in use. There are many choices, ranging from silicone, to wood, to stone. We chose this rangetop cover based on several things: looks (it is beautiful), durability (acacia hardwood) and adaptability. It looks beautiful sitting on the rangetop. It can be used as a cutting board. It can be used as a charcuterie board. It also fits the sink top. The handles make it easily portable. This was a great find at a great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and Easy to Move
reviews.reviewText: I got this board as a cover for my ceramic stove, and it fits nicely. The wood is sturdy, but not too heavy; I can easily move it when I need to use the stove, and put it back without heavy lifting.The handles were easy to install, and mine came with an extra third handle, which I think I’ll keep as backup if one wears down.Finish on the wood looks really nice, so it looks great on my stove!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality and usefulness
reviews.reviewText: Much better than expected. Finish is high quality and adds working counter space along with great looks. Easy to lift on and off for stove top use, but you do need a handy place to put it while cooking. Bought one for us and one of our daughters and we both are impressed with usefulness. Can also be used as large serving tray for larger gatherings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Space for holiday.
reviews.reviewText: This noodle board was wonderful. It is very pretty, fits nice and we had all the extra space for Christmas food. Love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Nice board. However arrived with some nics and scratches. We oiled it and it covered most of the blemishes. Very sturdy and heavy. First order got lost and had to get a replacement. Then the lost order also came so ended up with 2. Amazon took care of the issue so all was good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This stove top cover is absolutely gorgeous!!! Beautiful color and so well made! It arrived very well packaged. I am very impressed with this seller and with this stove top cover!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was thinking about getting a noodle board from a different company but the price was outrageous. I really wanted something that would look pretty and be functional and I found it! This board is lovely. Very well crafted and price is very very good. The order came quickly and I actually bought 2, one for me and one for my daughter’s stove top. Both pictured with my review. I would absolutely order from them again or recommend them.
